Xsens is setting a new standard in inertial motion capture for film, VFX, and virtual production. With the release of Xsens Animate 2025, professionals can achieve AAA-quality data with lifelike motion, faster setup, and minimal cleanup, anywhere the creative process takes them. Seamless integration with Unreal Engine and leading industry tools ensures smooth workflows from capture to final frame.

At SIGGRAPH, weâ€™ll demonstrate both our latest software innovations and a preview of upcoming technical advancements, all designed to enhance real-time workflows and elevate visual storytelling. From previs to post, Xsens empowers studios to focus on performance.
